'''Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. The achievements are earned by opening [[chests]] on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in [[Inazuma]].
